com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.config
Class WorldConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.config.WorldConfig

public class WorldConfig
extends java.lang.Object

World configuration settings. Gathers all the settings for a given world.

Author:
nitnelave

WorldConfig

public WorldConfig(java.lang.String name)
Main constructor. Load the config from the file, or create a default one if needed.

Parameters:
name - The world's name.
folder - The plugin folder.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - Carry the exception from load.
java.io.IOException - Carry the exception from load.
org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - Carry the exception from load.

public WorldConfig(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.Object... l)
Deprecated. 

Old constructor, kept for migration compatibility.

Parameters:
name - The world's name.
l - The list of Objects corresponding to the settings.

load

public void load()
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException
Load the config from the file.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the config file is not found and could not be created.
java.io.IOException - If the config file could not be read.
org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - If the config file is not a valid YAML configuration file.

          throws java.io.IOException

isAbove

public boolean isAbove(org.bukkit.Location loc)
Get whether the location is above the replace limit defined in this world, if height replacement is enabled.

Parameters:
loc - The location to test.
Returns:
Whether the location is above the limit, or true if height replacement is not enabled.

Whether any grief protection is enabled.
